law.catch_line: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the State Board of Nursing.
"Licensed practical nurse" has the meaning stated in § 8-101 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Registered nurse" has the meaning stated in § 8-101 of the Health Occupations Article.

text.section: An individual who acts without malice is not civilly liable for making a report as required by § 8-505 of the Health Occupations Article.
